text: Malik Barkat Ali (April 1885 - 5 April 1946) was an Indian politician, lawyer and journalist. ==Early life == Malik was from Lahore, Punjab, British India. == Career == Ali supported the All India Muslim League. His grandson played cricket for the International Cricket Team of Pakistan and later became the International Team's Manager and ICC referee for Cricket Globally. His Great Grandson is currently an Assistant Professor with a PhD in Organisational Behaviour, and resides in the United Kingdom. Category:1885 births Category:1946 deaths Category:Indian journalists Category:Indian lawyers Category:Politicians from Lahore
title: Malik Barkat Ali
